rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large space with Mediterranean tiled floor and a decorative archway. Vastu-aligned entry to enhance positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the garden. Warm Mediterranean colors and rustic finishes are used.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining area adjacent to the living room, incorporating an accent wall with Mediterranean patterns.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with functional layout and integrated pantry. Features Mediterranean-style cabinetry and a breakfast nook.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact guest bathroom for convenience, with simple yet elegant finishes.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space located near the living room for minimal distractions. Equipped with ample natural light and built-in shelves.

openings.description: Mediterranean styled door with wood finish, aligning the flow of energy per Vastu.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that allow abundant natural light and offer views of the garden and swimming pool area.
Open plan transition door that supports fluid movement between spaces.
Large window enhancing ventilation and connection to the outdoor garden, keeping with Mediterranean aesthetics.
Discreet door placement ensuring privacy while maintaining smooth flow.

exterior.name: Swimming Pool Area
exterior.description: A dedicated swimming pool area with tiled deck and built-in seating. The pool is positioned on the west side for optimum sunlight per Mediterranean design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and a walk-in closet. Vastu-compliant orientation for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to maximize space on the irregular plot layout. Features built-in storage and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional third bedroom with flexible seating area for study or relaxation. Windows are aligned to promote light and air flow as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern ensuite attached to the master bedroom with updated fixtures and natural stone finishes.

openings.description: Spiral staircase designed for space efficiency, ensuring a smooth transition between floors and aligning with Vastu.

notes.vastu_principle: The entry is oriented towards the north-east for optimal energy flow. Bedrooms are positioned on the west side for restful sleep, while living spaces face east to maximize morning light.
notes.building_norms: This plan adheres to local building codes with attention to seismic safety and sustainable construction practices.
